Translations.Text: Oebbi akked Umazan iS kksen aeeppem i imcurak ukud taaqqdem
Ddut di tmurt kue wagguren. Cfut ar kunwi ur tesfunnugem i Oebbi, u Oebbi ad Isdull ijehliyen

Aberree i medden, s$uo Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ass n eioo ameqwoaean, ar Oebbi akked Umazan iS, kksen aeeppem i imcurak. "Ma testeooaam, ppif i kunwi, ma twexxoem, cfut ar kunwi ur tesfunnugem i Oebbi". Becceo wid ijehlen s uaaqeb aqeoean
Kkes ed wid ukud taaqqdem seg imcurak, sinna ur kwen bbwiven s wacemma, ur ullen yiwen mgal nnwen. Iifet di lemaahda nnsen ar lmudda s. Oebbi, s tidep, Ieemmel wid ipeezziben
Mi aaddan wagguren ioqan, nna$et imcurak anda ten tufam. Iifet pen, eeoset pen, andit asen yal taxettalt. Ma steooaan, eeulen, zekkan, ooet asen abrid. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ma issuter ak laanaya, yiwen seg imcurak, eareb fellas, ard issel i wawal n Oebbi, sinna, ssiwev it s amkan is n laman. Akka, acku nitni, s tidep, d agdud ur nessin
Amek ara tili i imcurak, lemaahda s$uo Oebbi u s$uo Umazan iS, siwa wid taahdem ar Loamaa n Leaoam. Skud sweqmen yidwen, sweqmet yidsen. Oebbi, s tidep, Ieemmel wid ipeezziben
Amek, mi kwen $elben, ur kwen qudoen ilmend n yi$es, ne$ n lemaahda. Ouvan kwen s imawen nnsen; ulawen nnsen ugin. Tegwti segsen d iballa$en
U$en s issekniyen n Oebbi ayen oxisen. Ssefoa$en $ef ubrid iS. S tidep, ay dir wayen xeddmen nitni
Ur qudoen lmumen ilmend n yi$es, ne$ n lemaahda. Wigi, ih, d wid izegren tilas
Ma steooaan, eeulen, zekkan, d atmaten nnwen di ddin. Nepfeuuil issekniyen i ugdud issnen
Ma seenten tagalit nnsen, deffir lemaahda nnsen, u wwten di ddin nnwen, nna$et iqweooa n tijehli. Nitni, s tidep, ur ppaiafen di tgallit. Amar ad fukken
Day ur tepna$em ara agdud i iseenten tagalit nnsen, u ib$an ad ssuff$en Amazan, u nitni heomen kwen d imezwura? Day ten tugadem? D Oebbi i iklalen a T tagwadem, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Nna$et pen, a ten Iaaqeb Oebbi s ufus nnwen, a ten Ixzu, a kwen Iserbee fellasen, ad Icfu idmaren n ugdud n lmumnin
Ad Ikkes urrif n wulawen nnsen. Oebbi Issuruf i win i S ihwan. Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab
Day t$ilem a ppepwaterkem, wanag ur Ieoi Oebbi wid, degwen, ijuhden, ur neddi d imawlan, war Oebbi akked Umazan iS, akked lmumnin? Oebbi Ieoa ay txeddmem
Ur issefk ara i imcurak ad kecmen leowamaa n Oebbi, ad cehhden $ef tijehli nnsen. Widak neqven igiten nnsen, di tmes ad wekkoen
Ara ikecmen kan leowamaa n Oebbi, d wid iumnen s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru, ieeulen, izekkan, ippagwaden siwa Oebbi. Ahat wigi ad ilin seg wid ipwanhan
Day terram win i isswan ieaalak, i ibedden i Loamaa n Leaoam, am win iumnen s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru u innu$ deg ubrid n Oebbi? Ur aadilen ar Oebbi. Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas
Wid iumnen, iunagen, u nnu$en deg ubrid n Oebbi s wayla nnsen akked iman nnsen, aalay umekkan nnsen, ar Oebbi. Wigi d wid ara irebeen
Ibecceo iten Mass nnsen s ueunu s$uoeS, akked llza, akked leonanat, degsen ssaad imezgi
ad wekkoen degsen i lebda. Ih, ar Oebbi, arraz ameqwoaean
A wid iumnen! Ur pparat d imawlan, ibabaten nnwen akked watmaten nnwen, ma smenyafen tijehli i liman. Wid segwen i ten iran d imawlan, ad ilin, nitni, d imednas

Ini: "maday, sennig Oebbi akked Umazan iS, akked umennu$ deg ubrid iS, ay teemmlem ibabaten nnwen, tarwa nnwen, atmaten nnwen, tilawin nnwen, alag nnwen, ayla i tkesbem, ttjaoa i tugadem a ppe$li, tinezdu$in i kwen iaaoben, ihi, gganit ar d Ias Oebbi, s lameo iS. Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud iballa$en
Ni$ Isrebe ikwen Oebbi deg waias imukan, akked wass n Eunain, mi kwen taaoeb iiaqa nnwen. Ur awen d tebbwi acemma. Tamurt iwsaan, tu$al awen tediyeq. D$a tezzim d, trewlem
Sinna, Issers ed Oebbi talwit iS $ef Umazan iS, akked lmumnin, Issers ed iasekoiwen ur tepwalim. Iaaqeb wid ijehlen. D wagi ay d aqeiii ijehliyen
Sinna, deffir waya, Oebbi Issuruf i win i S ihwan. Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
A wid iumnen! Imcurak maafunit kan. Ur d pqeooiben ar Loamaa n Leaoam, mara ifukk useggwas agi nnsen. Ma tugadem lqella, a kwen I$it Oebbi, s lfevl iS, ma ihwa yaS. Ih, Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab

Nna$et wid ur numin ara s Oebbi, u s wass aneggaru, ur pgeddilen ayen Igdel Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ur xeddmen ddin n tidep, seg wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, alamma xeluen tabzert s war amunnu, d imejjiueen
Nnan wudayen: "Auzayeo d mmi S n Oebbi". Nnan imasieiyen: "lmasie d mmi S n Oebbi". Ayagi, nnan t id s imawen nnsen. Ppaawaden d awal n wid ijehlen, n zik. A ten Ine$ Oebbi! Aceal ieooifen
Rran lquooae nnsen, ixelwiyen nnsen, lmasie mmi s n Meryem, d imawlan war Oebbi. Pwamoen kan ad aabden Oebbi Yiwen; ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Gedha syiS, seg wayen pcaraken
B$an s yimawen nnsen ad ssexsin tafat n Oebbi. I Ib$a Oebbi, ad Itim kan tafat iS, di nneqwma ijehliyen
D Neppa id Iuznen Amazan iS, s nnhaya akked ddin n tidep, iwakken a t Issifer $ef ddin meooa, xas ugin ijehliyen

A wid iumnen! Aias n lqweooae d ixelwiyen, s tidep, teppen d aeerfi ayla n medden. U ieooifen seg ubrid n Oebbi. Wid ixeznen ddheb d lfeiia, ur ten pseddiqen deg ubrid n Oebbi, becceo iten s uaaqeb aqeoean
Ass ideg ara o$en di tmes n Loahennama, ad kwin, yissen, inyiren nnsen, ibeodiyen nnsen, iarar nnsen. "D ayagi ay txezznem i iman nnwen. Jeoobet ayen txezznem

Ih, ar Oebbi, amvan n wagguren: mrawsin; di Tezmamt n Oebbi, ass ideg Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan. Garasen, kue oqan. D wagi ay d ddin n ddwam. Ur ddenniset iman nnwen degsen. Nna$et ijehliyen $ef ccfa, akken i kwen nnu$en $ef ccfa. Cfut, Oebbi Iteddu d wid ipeezziben

Aswexxeo n waggur d timerniwt kan n tijehli. Nnetlafen yis wid ijehlen. Aseggwas a t eellen, aseggwas a t gedlen, iwakken ad wafqen amvan n wayen Igdel Oebbi. Ad eellen ayen Igdel Oebbi. Aaoben ten yir igiten nnsen. Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud ijehliyen

A wid iumnen! Acu kwen iu$en? Ma nnan awen: "hejjmet ar ubrid n Oebbi", a ppebrum i iman nnwen. Day kwen taaoeb tmeddurt n ddunit, sennig tin n laxeot? Zzhu n tmeddurt n ddunit d amejiiiue kan, zdat win n laxeot
Ma ur tehjjimem ara, a kwen Iaaqeb s lqeoe, a d Iawi agdud nniven, deg umekkan nnwen. Ur T teiiuoum s wacemma. Oebbi Izmer i yal cci

Ma ur t tsellkem, ihi, Isellek it Oebbi, mi t ssuff$en wid ijehlen. Wissin n sin, mi llan deg ifri, mi inna i umeddakwel is: "kkes a$wbel, Oebbi, s tidep, yidne$". Issers ed Oebbi talwit iS fellas, Iaawen it s iasekriwen, ur ten twalam. Isse$li mavi awal n wid ijehlen. Awal n Oebbi, neppa, aalay sennig akw. Oebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Hejjmet fessusit u eeayit, juhdet s wayla nnwen akked yiman nnwen, deg ubrid n Oebbi. Ppif wakka i kunwi, lemmer teeoim

Lemmer d aba$uo isehlen, d inig wezzilen, yili vefoen k in. Maca, $wezzif fellasen umecwao. Ad ggalen s Oebbi: "lemmer nezmir, yili neffe$ yidwen". Nn$an iman nnsen, Oebbi Ieoa ar nitni, war ccekk, d ikeddaben
Ad ak Isemmee Oebbi! Acimi i sen tsereev? Ard ak d iban anwi innan tidep, a ppissinev ikeddaben
Ur ak d ssutren ara tsrie, wid iumnen s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru, mi juhden s wayla nnsen akked yiman nnsen. Oebbi Issen wid ipeezziben
I k issutren tsrie, d wid ur numin s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru. Cukken wulawen nnsen, d$a, s ucukku nnsen, kukran
Lemmer b$in tuff$a, yili heggan as d ayen ilaqen. Maca, Iugi Oebbi ad ppucegaan, Iurez iten. Nnan asen: "qqimet d wid iqqimen
Lemmer ffi$en yidwen, ar awen rnun siwa ccwal. War ccekk, ad kecmen garawen, b$an ahewwel nnwen. Kra segwen ssemeasen asen. Oebbi Issen imednas
Ni$ b$an, si zik, ahewwel. Sxeoben ak lumuo, armi d tusa tidep. Iveho ed lameo n Oebbi, nitni ur b$in
Garasen win id innan: "serree iyi, ur iyi gar di lfetna"! Day ur $lin ara di lfetna? Loahennama, s tidep, a ppezzi i ijehliyen
Ma iusa k id yise$ ad $weblen. Ma tusa k id twa$it, ad inin: "ni$, iu$ leal, neqva lameo nne$". Ad wexxoen, zzhan
Ini: "ur a$ ipeaz wacemma, siwa ayen i $ Iura Oebbi". Neppa d Bab nne$. Â£ef Oebbi ara ppeklen lmumnin
Ini: "acu teggunim ad ivou yidne$, siwa yiwen si sin ise$iyen? Nekwni negguni a kwen Iwwet Oebbi, s uaaqeb ara d iasen s$uoeS, ne$ seg ifassen nne$. Ihi gganit, nekwni a neggani yidwen
Ini: "seddqet, teb$am ne$ tugim, d ayen ur neppwaqbal segwen, d awez$i. Kunwi, s tidep, d agdud iballa$en
Ay sen ikksen a tepwaqbal ssadaqa nnsen, imi kan jehlen, s tidep, ar Oebbi akked Umazan iS, u s laagez kan ay d ppasen ar tpeallit, s usmiglez kan ay pseddiqen
Ur k ippaaoab wayla nnsen, ne$ tarwa nnsen. Ib$a kan Oebbi a ten Iaaqeb yissen di tmeddurt n ddunit, ad iffe$ ooue nnsen, nitni d ijehliyen
Ad ggalen s Oebbi, ar nitni, war ccekk, segwen. Ur nitni segwen, maca d agdud iugaden
Lemmer ad afen ssoan, ne$ ifran, ne$ anda ara kecmen, ad oueen $uoes s tazla
Garasen, wid ikkaten deg k, $ef ssadaqat. Ma ippunefk asen segsent, ad oavin, ma ur asen ippunefk, ad neewen
Lemmer nitni, s tidep, ouvan ayen i sen Ifka Oebbi akked Umazan iS, u nnan d: "nesteqnaa s Oebbi. Ad a$ d Ifk, si lfevl iS, Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Ih, d Oebbi i$ef neo$eb

Ssadaqat siwa i ime$ban, ieawaliyen, i wid ice$wlen degsent, i usemlili n wulawen, i userree imeebas, i imeiiulba, i ubrid n Oebbi, i win d ifka ubrid. D aeeppem s$uo Oebbi. Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab

Garasen, wid icettmen deg Umazan, qqaoen: "neppa d aeessas". Ini: "d aeessas n lxio i kunwi. Iumen s Oebbi, iumen lmumnin. D aeunu i wid iumnen segwen". I wid icettmen deg Umazan n Oebbi, aaaqeb aqeoean
Ad awen ggalen s Oebbi, iwakken a kwen oavin. Oebbi akked Umazan iS, Iklal kteo a T oavin, lemmer llin d lmumnin
Day ur eoin ara ar, win ixuumen Oebbi akked Umazan iS, i neppa times n Loahennama, ad iwekkeo degs? D wagi ay d ddell abarar
Ixabiten ugaden ad asen d ters tsuoep, ad asen tessken i illan deg ulawen nnsen. Ini: "mmaalket. Oebbi, s tidep, a d Issuffe$ ayen tugadem
Ma testeqsav ten, a d inin, war ccekk: "la nheddeo kan, nepqessio". Ini: "day la tettihim di Oebbi akked issekniyen iS, akked Umazan iS
Ur steooiaat. Ni$ tu$alem ar tijehli, deffir liman nnwen". Ma Nsemmee i urbaa segwen, a Naaqeb arbaa, imi nitni llan d ibe$wviyen
Ixabiten akked txabitin, wa ippameo i wa, ayen n dir, ppemyegdalen lewqama, pcuddun ifassen nnsen. Ppun Oebbi, Ippu ten. Ih, ixabiten d iballa$en
Iwaaaed Oebbi, i ixabiten, txabitin, akked ijehliyen, times n Loahennama, degs ad wekkoen. Beoka ten. Ixza ten Oebbi. Fellasen aaaqeb imezgi

am imezwura nnwen. Llan ifen kwen tazmert, $elben kwen ayla, tarwa. Zhan deg umur nnsen, tezham deg umur nnwen, akken zhan imezwura nnwen deg umur nnsen. Teccvem akken ccven nitni. Widak, mean igiten nnsen di ddunit, di laxeot. Widak d imexsuoen
Day ur ten id iusa ara usali imezwura nnsen? Agdud n Nue, Aad, Tamud, agdud n Iboahim, At Median, tid ippin. Usan ten id imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen. Ur ten Idennis Oebbi, maca llan dennisen iman nnsen

Lmumnin, argaz tameiiut, d imeddukal wa n wa. Ppamoen lewqama, pgeddilen ayen n dir. Peallan, pzekkin, ppa$en awal i Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Wigi, ad Ieun Oebbi fellasen. Ih, Oebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab

Iwaaaed Oebbi i lmumnin, argaz tameiiut, leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, ad wekkoen degsen; ixxamen igerzen di leonanat n Aaden, akked llza s$uo Oebbi - iten i$elben akw -. D wagi ay d rrbee ameqwoaean
A Nnbi! Jahed ijehliyen akked ixabiten. Iqsie $uosen. Axxam nnsen d Loahennama, d taggara tucmip

Ggulen s Oebbi ur d nnin, wanag nnan awal n tijehli. Jehlen deffir wannuz nnsen. Vemaen ayen iwumi ur waan. Ur ezinen imi iten I$at, si lfevl iS, Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Ma steooaen, yif it i nitni. Ma wexxoen, a ten Iaaqeb Oebbi s leqoee, di ddunit, di laxeot. Ur saun, di tmurt, bab ne$ amaiwen
Garasen, wid iaahden Oebbi: "ma Ifka ya$ d, si lfevl iS, a nseddeq, a nili si lauuam
Mi sen Ifka si lfevl iS, a t bexwlen, ad wexxoen, ad namren
Issegwra yasen d tanaauot deg ulawen nnsen, ar ass ideg ara mlilen yideS, imi xed$an Oebbi deg wayen i S aahden, imi llan skiddiben
Day ur eoin ara Oebbi Issen sser nnsen akked wayen qqaoen u, ar Oebbi Issen tibavniyin
Wid ipqeooiven di lmumnin i ib$an ad seddqen, u deg wid i iufan siwa tazmert nnsen, d$a ttihin fellasen; ad Ittihi Oebbi fellasen. Fellasen aaaqeb aqeoean
Ssuter ad ppusemmeen, ne$ qqim. Ma tessutrev uavet iberdan, ur sen Ipsemmie Oebbi, d awez$i. Akka, imi nitni jehlen ar Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud iballa$en

Wid igwran, feoeen mi llan deffir Umazan n Oebbi. Ugin ad nna$en s wayla nnsen akked teowiet nnsen, deg ubrid n Oebbi. Nnan: "Ur poueut deg una$uo". Ini: "times n Loahennama teema kteo, lemmer day fehhmen
Anef ad vsen cwii, ad run aias, d aqeiii n wayen keppben

Ma Irra k id Oebbi ar urbaa segsen, u ssutren ak d tsrie ad ff$en, ini: "d awez$i, ur teppeff$em yidi, ur tepna$em acengu yidi. Akken, kunwi, iaoeb ikwen i$imi, abrid amenzu, ihi, qqimet akked ineggura
Ur pealla $ef yiwen degsen, ma immut, d awez$i. Ur pbedda ar tenielt is. Nitni, s tidep, jehlen ar Oebbi akked Umazan iS, mmuten nitni d iballa$en
Ur k ippaaoab wayla nnsen, ne$ dderya nnsen. Oebbi Ib$a kan a ten Iaaqeb yissen di ddunit, ad asen teffe$ taowiet nitni d ijehliyen
Ma ters ed tsuoep: "amnet s Oebbi, jahdet akked Umazan iS", imeokantiyen nnsen a k ssutren tsrie, ad inin: "anef ane$ ar wid iqqimen
Ouvan ad ilin akked wid igwran. Ppusel$en wulawen nnsen, ur fehhmen
Maca, amazan akked wid iumnen yides, jehden s wayla nnsen akked yiman nnsen. Widak, nnsen lxio. Widak, d nitni ara irebeen
Ihegga yasen d Oebbi leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkoen. D wagi ay d rrbee ameqwoaean
Wid id iufan ssebba, seg waaoaben n uclue, usan d, ad asen ifk tsrie. Wid iskaddben Oebbi akked Umazan iS, qqimen. Wid ijehlen, segsen, ad saaddin aaaqeb aqeoean
Ur telli tuzzma $ef uohifen, imuvan, wid ur nufi ara fken, ma neueen ar Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Ur telli tuzzma $ef iaaoviyen. Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Am akken, i wid ik id iusan a ten tneqqlev, tenniv: "ur awen ufi$ ara kwen ineqqlen". U$alen, allen feggvent seg imeiiawen, $weblen imi ur ufin ara sedqen
Tuzzma kan $ef wid ik issuturen tsrie, nitni d imeokantiyen. Ouvan ad ilin akked ineggura. Isle$ Oebbi ulawen nnsen, d$a ur ssinen

Ad awen ssutren ssmae, ma tu$alem d $uosen. Ini: "ur ssuturet ssmae, ur kwen numin d awez$i. Ni$ Imla ya$ Oebbi asali nnwen. Ad Ieeo Oebbi akked Umazan iS, igiten nnwen. Sinna, a ppu$alem ar Umusnaw n wayen iffren akked wayen ur neffir, ad awen Imel ayen txeddmem
Ad awen gren Oebbi, mi d tu$alem $uosen, iwakken ad asen tanfem. Wexxeot asen; nitni, s tidep, d laaouo; axxam nnsen d Loahennama, d aqeiii n wayen keppben
Ad awen ggalen iwakken a ten toavim. Ma touvam ten, ihi, Oebbi ur Ipoavi agdud iballa$en
Aaoaben n uclue zaden di tijehli akked nnxayel, zeggwiren ar uzgar n tilas id Issers Oebbi i Umazan iS. Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab
Ger waaoaben n uclue, wid ieesben ayen seddqen d tabzert. Ggunin a ppekees fellawen teswiat. Fellasen abeddel adiran n teswiat! Oebbi Issel, Issen

Ger waaoaben n uclue, wid iumnen s Oebbi d wass aneggaru, eesben ayen seddqen a ten ieeie ar Oebbi akked teilla Umazan. Day macci, s tidep, d ayen ara ten ieeieen? A ten Issekcem Oebbi deg ueunu S. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

Imenza i izwaren, seg iminigen, imaiwnen, akked wid i ten iaanden ar lewqama, Iouva ten Oebbi, ouvan T. Ihegga yasen d leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, ad wekkoen degsen, i lebda. D wagi ay d rrbee ameqwoaean
Ger waaoaben n uclue, i wen d izzin, llan at sin wudmawen, akw ger imezda$ n Lmadina. Zgan di nnxayel. Ur ten tessinev. Nekwni, Nessen iten. A ten Naaqeb berdayen, sinna, ad ppunefken i uaaqeb abarar
Wiyad qaooen s ibekkaven nnsen, ssemlalen igi ilhan d win nniven icemten. Izmer Oebbi ad asen Issuref. S tidep, Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Eddem ed ssadaqa seg wayla nnsen, a ten tezzizdeg, a ten tueffi. eEeal ilmend nnsen. Ih, tieilla k d talwit nnsen. Oebbi Issel, d Amusnaw
Day ur eoin ara Oebbi, Neppa, Iqebbel asteooaa s$uo ixdimen iS? Ippaiaf ssadaqat. Ih, Oebbi Issuruf, Ipeunu
Ini: "xedmet! Ad Iwali igiten nnwen, Oebbi, Umazan iS, akked lmumnin. Tu$alin nnwen ar Umusnaw n wayen iffren akked wayen ur neffir, ad awen Imel ayen txeddmem
Wiyav pganin lameo n Oebbi, a ten Iaaqeb, ne$ ad asen Issuref. Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab

Wid irran loamaa i lemveooa akked tijehli, i lefoaq ger lmumnin; d taxettalt i wid, iu$ leal, llan pna$en Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ad ggalen, war ccekk: "ay neb$a siwa lewqama". Ad Icehhed Oebbi ar nitni, s tidep, d ikeddaben
Ur ppili, degs, d awez$i. Iklal kteo, tilin ik, loamaa ibnan $ef ueezzeb, seg wass amenzu. Degs irgazen i ieemmlen ad izdigen. Oebbi Ieemmel izedganen
Day win issersen lebni s $ef ueezzeb i Oebbi akked llza, ur yif ara win issersen lebni s $ef rrif n ucouf ara iseggxen? Iseggex yis ar tmes n Loahennama. Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas
Izga lebni, bnan, ippara ccekk deg ulawen nnsen, alamma gezmen wulawen nnsen. Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab

Ih, Oebbi Iu$ ar lmumnin, iman nnsen akked wayla nnsen, imi Loennet i nitni. Pna$en deg ubrid n Oebbi. Nn$an, pwan$an. D lemaahda fellas, s tidep, di Tuoa, di Linoil akked Leqwoan. Anwa yifen Oebbi di tuiifa n lemaahda s? Feoeet, ihi, di ssuq tsewwqem. Wagi d rrbee ameqwoaean
Wid isteooaen, wid iaabden, wid ipcekkioen, ixelwiyen, wid iiiinizen, wid ikennun, wid ippamoen lewqama, wid ipgeddilen ayen n dir, wid ipearaben $ef tlisa n Oebbi ... Becceo lmumnin
Ur issefk ara i Nnbi akked wid iumnen, ad ssutren ad pwasemmeen imcurak, xas ppilin asen, ma iban asen d ar, nitni, war ccekk, d at tmes
Iboahim ur issuter ara ad ipwasemmee baba s, siwa ilmend n lemaahda i s ifka. Mi s d iban ar neppa d acengu n Oebbi, ifra p yides. Iboahim, war ccekk, ippanez, ieellem
Ur p Ixeddem Oebbi, ad Itlef agdud mbaad ma Inha ten, alamma i sen Ibeggen acu ara eezzben. Oebbi, s tidep, Issen yal cci
Ih, Oebbi, IneS tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan, Issidir, Ineqq. Ur awen illi, war Oebbi, bab ne$ amaiwen
Ni$ Issuref Oebbi i Nnbi akked iminigen, akked imaiwnen i iddan yides, di lweqt uwaio, mbaad ma qoib nneqlaben wulawen n urbaa segsen. Sinna, Issuref asen. Ih, Neppa, i nitni, dUmain, d'Aenin
U i krav id igwran, armi, tamurt iwsaan, tediyyeq fellasen. Vaqen deg iman nnsen. Ufan ur illi ssoan si Oebbi, siwa Neppa. Sinna, Issuref asen, akken ad steooaen. Oebbi, s tidep, Issuruf, Ipeunu
A wid iumnen! Eezzbet i Oebbi, ilit seg imawlan n tidep

Ur issefk ara i imezda$ n Lmadina, d wayen i sen d izzin n waaoaben n uclue, ad gwrin deffir Umazan n Oebbi, ne$ ad smenyafen iman nnsen i iman is. Ayagi, acku ur ten ipeaz fad, ne$ aaggu, ne$ llae, deg ubrid n Oebbi. Ur kecmen akal ara isserfun ijehliyen, ur ppaiiafen acemma s$uo ucengu, siwa ma dayen i sen iuran d igi n wayen ilhan. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Isoueu arraz iaaoviyen
Ur pueooifen cwii ne$ aias, ur zeggren asif, siwa ma iura yasen, iwakken a ten Ikafi Oebbi $ef wayen ilhan deg wayen xeddmen
Ur Issefk ara i lmumnin ad ff$en akw. Awufan ad iffe$ ugraw si yal arbaa, ad $bun di ddin, ad nabin agdud nnsen, mara u$alen $uosen. Amar ad steedren
A wid iumnen! Nna$et ijehliyen i kwen iqeoben. Ad afen, $uowen, teqsee. Cfut, Oebbi Ippili d wid ipeezziben
Mi d ters tsuoep, llan garasen wid iqqaoen: "anwa degwen, iwumi terna tagi, di liman"? Ma d wid iumnen, terna yasen liman, u nitni feoeen
Ma d wid iwumi blan wulawen, terna ammus i wammus nnsen. Mmuten u nitni d ijehliyen
Day ur walan ara, ar nitni la d sskaren lfetna, yal aseggwas, yiwen ubrid ne$ berdayen? Sinna, ur steooiaen, ur d smektayen
Mi d ters tsuoep, ad mesmuqalen: "day illa yiwen ikwen id Ipwalin"? Sinna, ad wexxoen. Isswexxeo Oebbi ulawen nnsen, imi nitni d agdud ur nfehhem
Ni$ iusa kwen id Umazan seg iman nnwen. eeay fellas laatab nnwen. Ipearab fellawen, d umain, d aenin i lmumnin
Ma wexxoen, ini: "Iqadd iyi Oebbi. Ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. FellaS ppekle$. Neppa d Mass n usgeld ameqwoaean
